summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by setting the hero tagline paragraph to `text-white` within `HeroSection.tsx`. However, there are additional unrelated file modifications (`frontend-file-summaries.txt`, `project_state.json`) that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added project tracking entries for the change request in `project_state.json` (e.g., AR-1/AR-2 marked pending).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked to change the hero tagline text color; it did not request modifications to project tracking/state files.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified `frontend-file-summaries.txt` content describing multiple UI/SEO/config features (e.g., header token, reduced header height, features section CTA, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly scoped changes to only the hero tagline text color and disallowed other styling changes; updating a broad frontend summary file is not requested by REQ-1.
